description: The smoky dark chocolate and sour bite of the passionfruit balance these tarts quite well.
name: Passionfruit & Dark Chocolate Tarts Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced and lightly butter 6 cupcake holders.
Rolled out the pastry and push into each of the cupcake holders to cover the bottom and edges fully to the top.
Cover the pastry with parchment paper and fill the cavity with uncooked rice or beans to maintain shape.
Bake in the oven for 20 minutes. Remove and allow to cool, remove the parchment and discard the rice or beans.
In a saucepan, melt the chocolate with the cream, maple syrup and puree until melted fully.
Now pour the mixture into the cooled pastry and allow to cool in the fridge for a minimum of 2 hours.
Once ready to serve, garnish with icing sugar and top with chocolate shards.
